analysis.description:
TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/10/0x2d82c4f8737623e12cb463041a1ba93c60eb2110.sol#513-522) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/10/0x2d82c4f8737623e12cb463041a1ba93c60eb2110.sol#519-520)

TimedCrowdsale.isOpen (/unique_chucks/10/0x2d82c4f8737623e12cb463041a1ba93c60eb2110.sol#535-540) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= _openingTime && block.timestamp <= _closingTime (/unique_chucks/10/0x2d82c4f8737623e12cb463041a1ba93c60eb2110.sol#537-539)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/10/0x2d82c4f8737623e12cb463041a1ba93c60eb2110.sol#554-558) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > _closingTime (/unique_chucks/10/0x2d82c4f8737623e12cb463041a1ba93c60eb2110.sol#556-558)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/10/0x2d82c4f8737623e12cb463041a1ba93c60eb2110.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.22 (/unique_chucks/10/0x2d82c4f8737623e12cb463041a1ba93c60eb2110.sol#16-22): it allows old versions
